page.title: 14OUR OLDEST RESIDENT
page.content: Mr.Clark is the oldest resident of Miltonduff.He is 83 years of age and he was born in Pluscarden.He has lived in this area all his life.As a boy he went to Pluscarden School but he left at the age of 14 and started work on Auchtertyre Farm. He got married and had two children who sadly died at an early age and he retired when he was 69. He does not go out very much and gets other people to do his shopping. He enjoys books about the Highlands of Scotland.His favourite authors are David Toulman and I.F.Grant. He has happy memories of the concerts and dances which were held weekly in all the local village halls. He is enjoying a peaceful retirement and has many visitors.
